components.component:
org.richfaces.OrderingList org.richfaces.OrderingList org.richfaces.component.html.HtmlOrderingList org.richfaces.component.UIOrderingList
org.richfaces.component.html.HtmlOrderingListComponentTest org.ajax4jsf.tests.AbstractAjax4JsfTestCase
The <rich:orderingList> is a component for ordering items in a list. This component provides possibilities to reorder a list and sort it on the client side.
caption Redefines the caption content. Related attribute is "captionLabel"
topControl Redefines the label for the "Top" control. Related attribute is "topControlLabel"
bottomControl Redefines the label for the "Bottom" control. Related attribute is "bottomControlLabel"
upControl Redefines the label for the "Up" control. Related attribute is "upControlLabel"
downControl Redefines the label for the "Down" control. Related attribute is "downControlLabel"
topControlDisabled Redefines the disabled label for the "Top" control
bottomControlDisabled Redefines the disabled label for the "Bottom" control
upControlDisabled Redefines the disabled label for the "Up" control
downControlDisabled Redefines the disabled label for the "Down" control
org.richfaces.OrderingListRenderer org/richfaces/htmlOrderingList.jspx
orderingList org.richfaces.taglib.OrderingListTag
org.ajax4jsf.webapp.taglib.HtmlComponentTagBase
&ui_input_attributes;
captionLabel java.lang.String
Defines caption representation text
ajaxKeys java.util.Set Defines row keys that are updated after an Ajax request
componentState org.ajax4jsf.model.DataComponentState It defines EL-binding for a component state for saving or redefinition
showButtonLabels boolean
If "true", shows a label for a button. Default value is "true"
true
topControlLabel java.lang.String
Defines a label for a 'Top' control
upControlLabel java.lang.String
Defines a label for a 'Up' control
downControlLabel java.lang.String
Defines a label for a 'Down' control
bottomControlLabel java.lang.String
Defines a label for a 'Bottom' control
listWidth java.lang.String
Defines width of a list. Default value is "140".
"140"
listHeight java.lang.String
Defines height of a list. Default value is "140".
"140"
rowClasses java.lang.String
CSS class for a row
""
columnClasses java.lang.String
CSS class for a column
""
controlsType java.lang.String
Defines type of a control: button or none. Default value is "button".
"button"
controlsHorizontalAlign java.lang.String
Controls horizontal rendering. Possible values: "left" - controls should be rendered to the left side of a list. "right"- controls should be rendered to the right side of a list. Default value is "right".
"right"
controlsVerticalAlign java.lang.String
Controls vertical rendering. Possible values: "top" - controls should be rendered aligned to top side of a list. "bottom" - controls should be rendered aligned to bottom side of a list. "middle" - controls should be rendered centered relatively to a list. Default value is "middle"
"middle"
orderControlsVisible boolean
If "false", 'Up' and 'Down' controls aren't displayed. Default value is "true".
true
fastOrderControlsVisible boolean
If "false", 'Top' and 'Bottom' controls aren't displayed. Default value is "true".
true
selection java.util.Set Collection which stores a set of selected items
submittedValue
localValueSet
valid true

""

ondownclick java.lang.String

onheaderclick java.lang.String
